meta.title: Explore Bloxd.io - A Fun Online Voxel Adventure
meta.description: Join Bloxd.io for exciting voxel adventures with diverse game modes. Complete maps, create avatars, and battle others!

hero.title: Welcome to Bloxd.io
hero.subTitle: Dive into the ultimate voxel gaming experience!

items.title: Diverse Game Modes
items.description: Experience various modes like BloxdHop, DoodleCube, and CubeWarfare for endless fun.

items.title: Creative Exploration
items.description: Enjoy Peaceful Mode to gather resources and build amazing structures at your own pace.

items.title: Exciting Challenges
items.description: Test your parkour skills in BloxdHop and EvilTower as you race against the clock.

items.title: Community Interaction
items.description: Engage with other players by voting on avatar designs in DoodleCube and battling in CubeWarfare.

items.text: Jump across blocks in BloxdHop before time runs out.
Create and vote on themed avatars in DoodleCube.
Climb the Demon Tower in EvilTower using your parkour skills.
Gather resources and build freely in Peaceful Mode.

items.question: What are the main game modes in Bloxd.io?
items.answer: The main modes include BloxdHop, DoodleCube, EvilTower, Peaceful Mode, and CubeWarfare.

items.question: Can I play Bloxd.io for free?
items.answer: Yes, Bloxd.io is free to play online.

items.question: How do I improve my skills in Bloxd.io?
items.answer: Practice in different modes and learn from other players to enhance your skills.

items.question: Is there a creative mode in Bloxd.io?
items.answer: Yes, Peaceful Mode allows for creative exploration and building.
